title: Dazzling Diamond Bangles - Kiran Kanganam
materials: 22K Yellow Gold with meticulously set brilliant-cut Diamonds. High-quality Hyderabadi polish for enduring shine and tarnish resistance. Diamonds are graded for VS clarity and G color.
features: Delicate chain-like design featuring repeating floral motifs encrusted with dazzling diamonds. The bangles offer a modern and subtle interpretation of traditional Indian jewelry. Secure closure mechanism ensures comfortable wear. Each bangle is handcrafted by skilled artisans.
colors: Primarily yellow gold with the sparkling brilliance of white diamonds.
occasions: or everyday elegance. Suitable for gifting during Ugadi
or anniversaries. Adds a touch of sophistication to any outfit.
description: These bangles are a perfect blend of traditional Indian aesthetics and modern design sensibilities. The high-quality gold and diamonds ensure lasting value and a brilliant shine. The delicate design makes them comfortable for daily wear while still being special enough for formal occasions. Represents the timeless elegance of Hyderabad's renowned jewelry craftsmanship.
